title: What Is The Future Of The MLB?
description:
Pablo Torre, Jeff Passan and Clinton Yates debate where they see the MLB’s lockout going from here and what the chances are that the Giants will trade Saquon Barkley.

itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Where Does The MLB Go From Here For The Upcoming Season?
